ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] (Off-Topic) Some advice?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Everlore is a good idea that isn t implemented too well. It s mostly a database of user inputs.  Unfortunately, because it s a database, they don t bother
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 28 Mar 2000, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>
> I was (asked? offered?) a place on EverLore.com for the EQ Glossary. I've
> turned down one previous offer because the site looked like crud, and had

Everlore is a good idea that isn't implemented too well.
It's mostly a database of user inputs. Unfortunately, because
it's a database, they don't bother cleaning it up. So it
becomes like a web portal that's never maintained. All the
outdated and incorrect information still remains to misguide
users unless they bother to read every one of the 50 comments
on a topic, and find out near the end that it's been changed.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
